name: action-comment
description: Comment on PRs with results of an Replay automated test run

scripts.tag: GIT_TAG=$(node -e "console.log('v'+require('./package.json').version)"); test -z "$(git tag -l $GIT_TAG)" && npm i && git add . && git commit -m "Publish $GIT_TAG" && git tag $GIT_TAG && echo "Tagged $GIT_TAG" || echo "Tag failed"

author: Replay.io
